persona: A retired automotive designer who pioneered advancements in car safety features
original_instruction: Search for articles on advancements in automotive safety features and filter results to show only articles published in the last five years
augmented_instruction: Search for "advancements in automotive safety features" on Google Scholar from the last 5 years.
final_instruction: Search for articles about advancements in automotive safety features published from 2018 to 2023.

task_steps.step: Enter the search query 'advancements in automotive safety features' in the search bar
task_steps.code: page.get_by_role('textbox', name='Search').fill('advancements in automotive safety features')

children.name: Stand on the shoulders of giants

task_steps.step: Press the Enter key to execute the search
